frameDefinitions: A Supply of a Resource is kept safe and available for a future Use.
A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
A Submittor gives Documents to an Authority so that they can be processed as part of an application, evaluation or other official or bureaucratic process.
A Sender plans the Path (along with Source and Goal) of a Theme and places it in circumstances such that it travels along this Path under the power of some entity other than the Sender.
A Resource is depleted by some process, resulting in there being only a Remainder in existence some time into or after the process.
frameExamples: The lenses , like the <t><fex name='Rest'>rest</fex></t> of the exoskeleton, are made of calcite.
Our <t>supply</t> of food is running low.
Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
I  was sure I had passed as soon as I <t>handed</t> <t>in</t> the test. DNI
I <t>sent</t> the manuscript to England to Bill.
There are only two poems <t>left</t> from Quayle
listRoleDefinitions: A <fen>Part</fen> of a larger <fen>Whole</fen> that has been mentioned in prior discourse or is available in the discourse setting.
The previously unmentioned part of the <fen>Whole</fen>.
The larger entitiy or group that is fully made up of the <fen>Part</fen> and the <fen>Rest</fen>.
This role denotes the <fen>Supply</fen> of <fen>Resource</fen>s. It is incorporated into each LU in this frame.
The goods or commodity that is being stored in a <fen>Supply</fen>.
The future <fen>Use</fen> for the <fen>Resource</fen>.
The entity that possesses the <fen>Supply</fen>.
A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
The person that begins in possession of the <fen>Documents</fen> and gives them over into the possession of the <fen>Authority</fen> for processing.
The individual or organization that ends up in possession of the <fen>Documents</fen> and processes them.
The artifacts containing content, typically in the form of text and images, that the Submittor gives to the <fen>Authority</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Submittor</fen> gives the <fen>Documents</fen> to the <fen>Authority</fen>.
The <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Submittor</fen> gives the <fen>Documents</fen> to the <fen>Authority</fen>.
This is the person who initiates the movement of the <fen>Theme</fen> and, unlike Carrying, does not accompany it.

The end of the path and intended goal of the sending.
I <t>sent</t> the logs <fex name='Goal'>to the shed</fex>.

The objects being sent.
I mailed <fex name='Theme'>the books</fex> <fex name='Goal'>to Alaska</fex>.
Note that <fen>Theme</fen> may be multiply instantiated.
They <t>mailed</t><fex name='Theme'>a questionnaire</fex> <fex name='Theme'>with a return envelope</fex>.

The mode of sending employed.
I <t>shipped</t> <fex name='Theme'>the crops</fex> <fex name='Transport_means'>by bigrig </fex>.

This is the recipient of the sent <fen>Theme</fen>.
<fex name='Sender'>Tess</fex> <t>mailed</t> <fex name='Theme'>a letter</fex> <fex name='Recipient'> to Abby</fex>
When the sending takes place
A spatial setting encomnpassing the Source location, where the Sending event takes place.
The part of the Resource that the Process has not yet applied to.
The original set of items to which the Depletive_process applies one after the other.
The individual who owned the Resource that is being depleted.

A temporal setting or event which metonymically stands for the entities that were in existence then. The <fen>Remainder</fen> is part of the <fen>Original_context</fen>. This role occurs especially when abstract entities such as social institutions are seen as <fen>Resource</fen>s.
The Time when the amount of the Resource that is let is assessed.
listRoleExamples: the GP had stipulated counselling as a complement <fex>to medication</fex>
You should try to persuade the <fex>rest</fex> of the family to do so whatever their personal opinions
India has made great strides in agriculture and now not only meets it own grain needs but has a sizeable reserve <fex>of basic grains, mainly rice and wheat</fex>.
Due to restrictions imposed by our export control, the Japanese have begun to use a portion of their <fex>war</fex> reserve of petroleum.
In 1997, <fex>France's</fex> stock of unirradiated civil plutonium increased to 72 tons.
I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.
The Human Services financial worker cannot decide if you will get food support benefits until <fex>you</fex> turn in the form and needed verifications.
If an application is late, whether you submitted it late <fex>to us</fex> or it was held up at your Command, NMETC will not be able to fund registration fees.

Once you have submitted <fex>the form</fex>, a request to make an oral statement will be
generated based on the information you supplied.
I sent the letter to you <fex>last week</fex>.
Barney posted the letter on Monday <fex>in Athens</fex>
Only two poems are left <fex>from Virgil Smithers</fex>
Only the Beaux Arts cinema is left <fex>from the golden era of the 1940s</fex>
<fex>In 1910</fex>, only two of the Renaissance buildings remained
